mapper.select:
SELECT POST_TITLE, CREATE_USER, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM POST WHERE 1=1
AND POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND CREATE_USER LIKE '%' || #{userName} || '%'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(POST_ID) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( BOARD_ID, POST_ID, POST_TYPE, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, DELETED, FILE_NO1, FILE_NO2, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER ) VALUES ( '5', ( SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(POST_ID)),1)+1 FROM POST ), '1', #{title}, #{content}, '0', NULL, NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userName}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userName} )
